attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: LOCAL Authoritys sickrate is over 49% of its workforce on long term sick or short term sickness. This is a waste of tax payers money funding workers who continuasly abuse the system, and provide a very poor public service to the people. withdraw funding from Local Authoritys who have high rates of sickness and make them cut council tax.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
